title: How to leap super far as Rengar without ulting (exploit)

embed.description: The more speed the better. Here I had 3 Quints of movementspeed, 3 points of Fleet of Foot. First I activated ghost before leaping out of the bush. I leaped all the way from the midlane bush and on top of Yasuo in the middle of the lane.

body: Check video description for how I exploited this
